title: I Became the Emperor’s Cat
summary:
After my sudden death, I was reincarnated in a strange world with a sultan and his harem, but not as a person, but as a kitten who can't talk!

I can only become human by kissing a prince who is worthy of the sultan...

After mistaking me for an assassin and treating me coldly, Prince Soliman says, "......It's soft, it's warm, can we stay here for a while?" as he approached me.

Prince Theron, who I thought was a sweetheart, seduces me by whispering, "Choose me over my brother, and I will give you everything you want." "I will give you everything you want," he whispered, seducing me.

I can't stay human unless I kiss one of them. "Nyaaong!" (Headache!)
How do I survive in this royal palace?

title: Marry In Bed At 19
summary: “As a birthday present, i'll give you my boyfriend.” Me Ahyeon and the top actress Seong Si-eun, seem like the closest and best friends in the whole world. While Si-Eun is a bright and famous star, Ahyeon is known as “the girl you can ask any favor". At Ahyeon's birthday party, Si-eun announces that she's bringing her boyfriend. And then, Ahyeon realizes that she was talking about Nam Terry, a guy who has always hated her... Can they share a boyfriend while preserving their friendship? No matter what you do, he says that “I'll never be able to like you.”

title: How Far Are You Okay With?
summary: “If it’s okay with you, Noona… Do you want to do that thing I just saw with me?” Eunpyeong finds it difficult to start dating because of painful memories. Nyuk, her underclassman from the same department, approaches her but Eunpyeong finds it hard to accept him. One day, Nyuk walks Eunpyeong home because she is drunk. At her house, he makes an unexpected discovery and a bold suggestion…

title: My Introverted Boy
summary: Do you ever wonder what the most popular boy at school is really like? As it turns out, he might be just as awkward and shy as any of us. That’s what wallflower Jayu Nam begins to discover after a chance encounter with Jahyeok Yeo, a boy in her class who seems to excel at everything in life. Well, almost. Underneath Jahyeok’s persona is a secret super-introvert who would rather just stay home, except his charming good looks keep forcing him into social situations. Together, Jayu and Jahyeok begin to learn a little something about friendship and maybe more…

title: Predatory Marriage
summary:
Lea wrote a suicide note ahead of the wedding.
Because she'll die after the first night.

It was the miserable end of a princess who devoted her entire life to her country and the royal family.
Before she gives up her life, Lea plans her final revenge on the royal family.

It is to become a new bride who has lost her innocence.

"Why did you give up your first experience like this? Don't you want to run away?
"I... want to die."

It was an impulsive remark because he was just a one-night stand.
I thought it was meant to end like that.
Until we meet again in an unexpected place.

He eroded her orderly daily life.
Despite knowing it was a dangerous relationship, she couldn't resist him.
What on earth is that man thinking?

"You don't remember?"
The man said with a fierce smile.

"I told you I'd ruin your life."

title: I Thought It’s a Common Possession
summary: I was the villainess who would die at the hands of the male lead, but I know this is a cliché! I thought it was a pretty good deal to die unjustly, as a payment for the price I paid for being the villainess. Until I realized that I couldn’t escape from the original plotline. If I was going to die anyway according to the original, then let’s give a kiss to my handsome husband!… Why did the original plot start to change?

title: Killer Peter
summary:
After devoting his life to the crime organization, Glory Club, Peter retires his status as a legendary killer and spends his remaining days running a quiet used bookstore.

But after being ambushed and nearly killed one day by the very organization he dedicated his life to, Peter finds his body magically reverted back to its teenage years!

Now that Peter is back to his peak physique, he sets out to settle the score with Glory Club!

---

**Official Translations**

[Thai](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/killer-peter/list?title_no=5899)

title: The Monster Duke Mistook Me for His Wife
summary: No summary available.

title: I Became a Dead Character in a Prison for Wastes
summary:
I reincarnated into a novel… but, hey… What am I supposed to do if I reincarnate in 10 years before the novel begins?

The location: prison. The problem is that even a jungle is better than this place!

After ten years finally passed, I became the top dog in this prison. 

*
“Hey Mint. Cut it out. Don’t go overboard.”

“I have no idea what you’re talking about.”

I became a good-for-nothing leader, but I’m fine with that. That’s a privilege a pro gets. 

“I’ll make you dead on paper, so do me one last favour.”
“I have no idea what you’re on about.”

A golden opportunity was bestowed upon me. 

“If you help me, I’ll release you from prison.”
“What do you want me to do, Master?”
“...”

The chief of the prison asked me, the psycho of the prison, for a favor.

“Make the new guy coming into the leader of this prison.”

It may be called a prison, but in reality, it’s a lawless place. If I can make one man into the leader, I can finally be released.

“But to do that, you need to enter a male prison.”
“...Huh? How can I attach something that’s not there and get in?”

But oh god? The new guy is the male lead of the original novel.

title: I don’t believe in my twin sister
Will you expose yourself today?!
summary:
Mini is a "Scum Detector", and her latest job is from a rich girl who wants to test her boyfriend's loyalty. However, her boyfriend, Zhao Yueming, is a straightforward gentleman, and Mini's usual methods don't work on him. This is a bit tricky for Mini, who is used to dealing with scumbags regularly. This game of tug-of-war between the womanizer and the one who understands them best is about to begin. Who will fall into the trap of love first?!

[Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0003618)
[Official Korean Translation](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=12220642)

title: I Want To Be Fooled
summary:
A proper villain must be ruthless and evil, a bringer of death! Having tormented the protagonist to his heart's content, he makes a brilliant exit. Once he's finished his work, he goes out with a bang.
Wang Yi was determined to be that kind of villain. Unfortunately… His male lead can read minds. (:з)∠*)
“You mongrel!” Mr. Wang chuckled as he looked down on the novel’s male lead.
Suddenly, a thought bubble filled with cute emojis (⁄ ⁄ ⁄ω⁄ ⁄ ⁄) and the words “You’re so cute…” appeared in front of Qin.
Qin: ?

title: Rebirth in the end times: I reached the top by opening boxes
summary:
Jiang Xiaoyong was betrayed and killed by a green tea girl in the apocalypse, but was accidentally resurrected a year ago and obtained the blind box system. 

He was always one step ahead of others, collecting supplies and spending a fortune to build a safe house before the apocalypse. He became stronger through the system and avenged his enemies in his previous life. 

From then on, he embarked on the road to the king's counterattack.

title: Military Phoenix
summary: As a military commander, I crossed over to the Sky Spirit Continent due to an accident. After opening my eyes, I encountered an inexplicable assassination. To that, I just wanted to say, "You messed with the wrong person!" I signed the system on the front foot, awakened the top spiritual power on the back foot, carrying a bazooka to do in the real culprit, stirring him up! The only thing that hurts is that there are too many people who are interested in me, so can I get to that actual perpetrator, huh?

title: Reborn as a Monster 2: Rise of the Beast God
summary: A thousand years ago, under the blood moon, spatial rifts opened, heralding the era of monsters! Countless monsters rampaged across the globe! Just as humanity was on the brink of complete extinction, the emergence of “Beast Spirit Masters” brought a glimmer of hope to all of humanity! With generations of inheritance and the development of “Beast Spirit Masters”, humanity successfully created a new civilizational order to combat the monster invasion! Lin Yuan, who was a top assassin in his previous life but was tragically betrayed and killed by his organization, transmigrates…

title: Mr Mo’s Secret
summary: A father who mysteriously disappeared, a mother who killed herself and clues that lie in a web of secrets. To find the truth, I decided to make an unspoken transaction with Mr. Mo, the most powerful man in the city. Who would have thought that a sweet man could be summoned with a kiss! One moment as cold as frost, one moment as hot as a stove, a boyfriend with such duality, I want it all. The quirky girlfriend vs a two-faced catlike tycoon, under the stars, till the end of time, I will only love…

title: You Can Hear It
summary:
There was an inn with an urban legend among adventurers. "The Inn that won't let you die if you stay there."  
  
Loretta arrives at the inn as part of her quest. What is the secret of the "Deathless Inn?"  
  
"Save Point."  
  
It was an inn ran by an maxed out adventurer with the ability to create "Save Points" who came from another world. He retired from being an adventurer and decided to run an inn, while training newbie adventurers. Loretta, who needs to become strong, will be trained by the innkeeper, Alexander.  
  
If you die, don't worry about it, just hit load!  
  
  
**TL;DR**:   
Isekai + RPG Save Points + POV of a Native instead of the OP Otherworlder  


---

**WN Series Raw (12 different works)**:   
<https://ncode.syosetu.com/s1747d/>

title: The Night After the Divorce
summary:
A year ago, Kaho married Shinya, who worked at an advertising agency. Their married life ended abruptly when she discovered his infidelity.

The void in her heart was unexpectedly filled by Iori, a younger college student. "I'm here for you, Kaho."

Though drawn to Iori, Kaho now faces pressure from Shinya to reconcile. Torn between two men, she must choose:

"Do I embrace this new love? Or repair what was broken?"

title: Don’t Mess with a Deadly Revenger [Official]
Anyone Can See It’s A Beast
summary:
Q: Can a wolf and a lion get married and have a rabbit as a kid?
A: Stop talking nonsense, wash your feet, and go to sleep.

...And just like that, I ended up in a situation where I really should just wash my feet and sleep. My dad's a lion, my mom's a wolf, and somehow, I'm a rabbit. Not just any rabbit, an extra who becomes the trigger for a war in the novel! At this rate, not only will everyone die, but both my mom's and dad's entire families will be wiped out.

'No way. I have to change my fate somehow.'

I clenched my fists and stood up determinedly, but then...

"Chloe, do you know what's for dinner tonight? That's right... rabbit meat!"

First things first, I need to make sure the wolves at home don't find out what I really am.

I thought all I had to do was hide the fact that I'm a rabbit. But a bigger problem showed up. Of all the countless special abilities among beastmen, I just had to get "being pitied." I thought this life was doomed too, but then...

"We’re not fighting. So... don't cry, okay? Please."

My parents, who even stopped a war because they were worried about me.

"Just say the word. If you want, I can kill everyone who's bullying you."

And even the original novel's male lead, who's gone a little overboard taking my side.

Honestly... stopping a war might be easier than I thought. Maybe this ability... is more useful than I realized?

title: The 139th Night
summary:
The Ran Empire, a country that carries 500 long years of history and the daughter of one of the four major families who aided the emperor at the time of its founding. The daughter who was abandoned as soon as she was born and was raised in the slums.

In front of Salk, who's on the verge of being sold as a concubine to a rotten old man, is a noble young lady. A lady who looks identical to Salk and is claiming to be her twin sister.

Hee-yeon, whose life is in danger, asks her twin sister, Salk, who she met for the first time after 19 years…

---
With its splendid history of five hundred years, Lan Empire has its own share of lights and shadows. Abandoned at birth, Lynx grows up in one of its slums although she is a daughter of the powerful House of Joo, one of four founding families of the empire from its birth. Just as Lynx is about to be sold off as a concubine to a senile old man, a noble lady appears in front of her. Heeyun Joo, the noble lady with a striking similarity to Lynx, claims to be her long lost older twin sister. With her life being extinguished steadily, Heeyun asks that Lynx, her twin younger sister reunited only after 19 years, pose as her.

---
Lynx Joo may be the daughter of one of the Empire's founding families, but being abandoned at birth, she is left to grow up in one of its slums. The future of a woman in the slums is bleak at best, so Lynx is ready for an out. She’s about to be sold off to a senile old man when she’s rescued by a noblewoman who looks just like herself. Claiming to be her older twin sister, Heeyun Joo asks her for a startling favor: to pose as her… or else.

---
[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=53648484)

**Official Translations:**
* English: [COPIN](https://copincomics.com/toon/363), [Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/1857), [NetComics](https://www.netcomics.com/comic/17330), [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/the-13th-night)

title: Regressor of the Fallen family
summary:
Logan McLain, a middle-aged knight fighting for the independence army, is intent on getting revenge against the empire which took over the kingdom and executed his brother when he ends up dying in battle. But when he wakes, he is a young man again, and has yet to be disowned for his terrible behavior. 

Using his experience and knowledge from his past life, Logan recruits a few talented individuals to develop new weapons, build an army, and make enough money to fund it all. 

But will he be able to make amends with his family and stop the empire's march?

title: Player Elimination Plan! When Anomalies Descend Upon The Human World
summary: The apocalypse prophecy has come true. A dark celestial body draws near, turning the entire Blue Star into a doomsday game. All of humanity has been reduced to NPCs—helpless prey for players from beyond the stars. As the world mutates and players run rampant, despair consumes mankind… Until Yun Qi awakens a hidden class, gaining the power to strike back against the players.

title: A Genius Writer’s Random Workplace
summary: Jinwoo Kim had been slaving as an assistant writer for 6 years with nothing to show for it. He quits his workplace. Later, he abruptly has a notification pop up and now he has scenes popping into his head and system prompts telling him he must be at a location to write. Maybe this is how he will become a star writer??

title: Shane’s Knight
summary: Ichinose Haruma is handsome, but the girl he likes happens to be even more handsome…?!

title: Too Much Regeneration! Now the King Obsesses Over Me
Even Though I Transmigrated as a Villainess, I’d Rather Raise a Cat
summary:
I transmigrated as Rowaine, the villainess who was executed for abusing a werebeast. In order to escape death, I decided to replace my sister Linier in her arranged marriage.

The problem is that Duke Blois, the groom, is a cat werebeast who is known as a bloodthirsty battlefield monster…

“My dear, I heard your hobbies include abusing werebeasts like myself.”

“I haven’t heard of such a condition stating that women who abused werebeasts could not be Your Grace’s wife, though.”

His emerald eyes flashed dangerously at me, I quickly kept speaking before he could say anything.

“If my hobby is a problem, then I promise that I will never abuse you, Your Grace.”

“Ha– what?”

This is the story of a ten-year contractual marriage between a cat lover and a prickly cat werebeast.

title: The Cloud Dream of the Nine – Zero
summary: No summary available.

title: This Reincarnated Countess Is Trying to Escape From Her Prince
Selena
summary: Welcome to Wellenberg, Meuracevia at the turn of the 19th century. The fate of Serenity Hotel, an opulent hotel in the nation’s capital, hangs by a thread as its headstrong heiress Serena and her stern husband Eiser struggle to turn its fortune around. Their loveless marriage of convenience takes a twisted turn following Serena’s jealous attachment to her stoic and handsome servant, Frederick. At a time when happiness takes a back seat to one’s sense of duty, will Serena be able to protect her love and ensure the survival of her family and her business?

title: I Became the Youngest Sister-in-law of the Ruined Reverse Harem’s Male Leads
summary:
Reincarnated in a ruined reverse harem novel, her sisters marry the male leads while she's left dealing with their overwhelming attention.

---
I reincarnated into a tragic reverse harem novel with no dreams or hopes left, and for some reason, the heroine died. Before I could fully process the shock of the original story being not just broken but erased, my sisters began pairing up with the male leads.

The playful and obsessive emperor fell for my mature and kind eldest sister.

The stoic and strongest swordsman in the world fell for my romance-genius second sister.

The flirtatious genius of the Magic Tower fell for my cynical youngest sister.

Me? I’m only six years old, so having a love line would land me in serious trouble. Anyway, my sisters seemed to get along well with their partners and eventually held weddings. But then...

"Lilliana, call me 'oppa.'"

"I'm your favorite brother-in-law, right?"

"It's an imperial decree. My youngest sister-in-law will live in the palace and be treated like a princess."

I just want to go back to the days when it was just me and my three sisters living together!

title: Gatekeeper Of The Boundless World
summary: Planets dying, gods falling. “Anomalies” and “Calamities” invade the human world. As a dark age descends, Shen Ye finds himself flung into this strange new reality. To his surprise, his power is to summon a door – a door leading to countless worlds, offering him a chance to adventure and train across the multiverse! Beyond the door, he encounters a mysterious skeleton with an unknown past…

title: Reincarnated as a Scumbag, I Use My Wife and Daughter to Prove Immortality
summary: A mighty Da Luo immortal, gravely wounded, descends to the mortal world and reincarnates into the body of the scumbag Jiang Tianchen. After a thousand years of being single, he encounters a gang trying to assault his wife and take his daughter — so he beats them down without mercy! If they’re dark, he’s darker! Anyone who comes will be drained dry, turning all enemies into cultivation resources for him, his wife, and his daughter on their path to immortality!

title: A Golden World to you
summary: Hinako, a girl who came from another world, made a vow of sisterhood with a giant called Elis, and together they became known as 'The Smallest Giants'. They both have goals that aligned in tracking down people who were significant to them. For Hinako, it is her 'Onee-sama' who was also transported to this world, and for Elis it's the kin she was separated from. However, when collecting their reward after fulfilling a request at the guild, Hinako caught the eye of a knight who serves the church...

title: Ha Buk Paeng’s youngest son
summary:
Habuk Peng Family’s best strength, Peng Jihyuk heads to the Nakho Region to save his family that fell into destruction due to the attack of the Demon Sect, but everything was a trap. At the moment of death, he felt the wrath of being the only one left from his beloved family.

‘Again…if you give me a chance…!”

Peng Jihyuk, who thought he was dead, woke up in the body of Young Master Sa, of the Peng Family.

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/pengjiasigongzi/list?title_no=2059)

title: The Concept-Grasping Magical Genius
summary:
Pauline became a mother figure to Rowan, who had lost everything. After Pauline left, Rowan grieved her and awakened to a power called 'Mana'. What's more, Rowan could even see the Mana of other people! 

Through mana, even though he's apart from Pauline, he can always feel like she's with him...

One day, Rowan encounters a shocking sight of Pauline, who he believed had left for a noble family.

title: A Fortune-Telling Princess
summary:
A story about an unattractive second-year student, Sakagami, being teased around by a mysterious first-year student who is good at fortune-telling, Mizuki-senpai… But at the same time is actually showing signs that she likes him…

A frustrating and strange romcom begins!

title: The Eunuch’s Consort Rules the World
summary: [Adapted from webnovel of the same name] In her previous life, she was betrayed and died. After transmigrating, her lonely soul fell upon the body of Xiliang Mo who suffered the same fate. She vowed to make those who harmed her pay, one step at a time. Breaking the legs of her insidious sister, forcing her pretentious stepmother to die, betraying her callous father. An unscrupulous husband? Then she'll just abandon and leave him, remarrying. But why does that villainous eunuch prince insist on marrying her? Although you got the looks of a deity, you're still a eunuch! They force her to become a eunuch's wife, then she'll become the number one heinous tyrant wife!

title: After Improperly Licking a Dog, I Became a Billionaire
summary: Once a typical simp, Lin Xin’s life takes a drastic turn when he’s dumped and inherits a divine financial system—starting him off with a whopping trillion yuan! But there’s a twist: he can only spend this fortune on women. Stuck with this bizarre stipulation, Lin Xin is forced to navigate an unconventional and thrilling path to wealth and power, transforming from a mere simp to a legendary tycoon.

title: Deadly Strong
summary: In his previous life, Su Ye stood as the last survivor amidst the world’s ultimate cataclysmic battle, a poignant witness to the downfall of humanity. However, after his demise, he inexplicably awoke to find himself reborn ten years into the past. Faced with impending and unparalleled challenges, he is resolute in his determination to lead everyone to triumph!

title: The Last Adventurer
summary:
In the Era of Adventure kickstarted by the spawning of Gates, marked by absolute hopelessness, destitute, desperation, and despair, everyone had given up their hope and lost their courage to continue fighting - except one adventurer that refused to go down until his last breath.

"You are the only one left, Last Adventurer Elpam."

As the history of adventurers was forced to come to an end, the Last Adventurer returned to where this story all began.

title: Mercenary Enrollment
summary:
At the age of eight, Ijin Yu lost his parents in a plane crash and became stranded in a foreign land, forced to become a child mercenary in order to stay alive. 

He returns home ten years later to be reunited with his family in Korea, where food and shelter are plenty and everything seems peaceful. But Ijin will soon learn that life as a teenager is a whole other feat of survival. With only one year of high school left, Ijin must master new tactics to maneuver his way around the schoolhouse battleground.

Can he survive a year of high school? Or rather, will the school be able to survive him?

title: The Villainous Husband I Killed Has Returned
summary:
After she killed her own husband, 3 years later in the last day of mourning...she found him standing on front of her asking...
"I don't remember dying, my lady! So why you wearing the mourning clothes?"

title: I Will Buy Divine Power With Money!
It’s not a case of being loved
summary: No summary available.

title: Regressing with the King’s Power
summary: In a world where one's worth is determined by how powerful their skill is, Taehyeon is 35, unawakened, and barely able to scrape by as a pack bearer for monster hunters. But when a mysterious being calling itself “the King” gives him a skill of his own, Taehyeon gets a second chance at life. Now he’s back in high school and armed with Gluttony, a skill that allows him to block and absorb the skills of others!
